verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> a prisoner <WG1198> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> and Timothy <WG5095> our brother, <WG80> to Philemon <WG5371> our beloved <WG27> [brother] and fellow <WG4904> worker, <WG4904>
and to Apphia <WG682> our sister, <WG79> and to Archippus <WG751> our fellow <WG4961> soldier, <WG4961> and to the church <WG1577> in your house: <WG3624>
Grace <WG5485> to you and peace <WG1515> from God <WG2316> our Father <WG3962> and the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
I thank <WG2168> my God <WG2316> always, <WG3842> making <WG4160> mention <WG3417> of you in my prayers, <WG4335>

because I hear <WG191> of your love, <WG26> and of the faith <WG4102> which <WG3739> you have <WG2192> toward <WG4314> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> and toward <WG1519> all <WG3956> the saints; <WG40>

[and I pray] that the fellowship <WG2842> of your faith <WG4102> may become <WG1096> effective <WG1756> through <WG1722> the knowledge <WG1922> of every <WG3956> good <WG18> thing <WG18> which is in you for Christ's sake. <WG1519>

For I have come to have <WG2192> much <WG4183> joy <WG5479> and comfort <WG3874> in your love, <WG26> because <WG3754> the hearts <WG4698> of the saints <WG40> have been refreshed <WG373> through <WG1223> you, brother. <WG80>
Therefore, <WG1352> though I have <WG2192> enough <WG4183> confidence <WG3954> in Christ <WG5547> to order <WG2004> you [to do] that which is proper, <WG433>

yet for love's sake <WG1223> I rather <WG3123> appeal <WG3870> [to you] – since I am <WG1510> such <WG5108> a person <WG5108> as Paul, <WG3972> the aged, <WG4246> and now <WG3570> also <WG2532> a prisoner <WG1198> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> –
I appeal <WG3870> to you for my child, <WG5043> whom <WG3739> I have begotten <WG1080> in my imprisonment, <WG1199> Onesimus, <WG3682>
who formerly <WG4218> was useless <WG890> to you, but now <WG3570> is useful <WG2173> both <WG2532> to you and to me.
And I have sent <WG375> him back <WG375> to you in person, <WG846> that is, [sending] my very heart, <WG4698>
whom <WG3739> I wished <WG1014> to keep <WG2722> with me, that in your behalf <WG5228> he might minister <WG1247> to me in my imprisonment <WG1199> for the gospel; <WG2098>

but without <WG5565> your consent <WG1106> I did not want <WG2309> to do <WG4160> anything, <WG3762> that your goodness <WG18> should not be as it were by compulsion, <WG318> but of your own free <WG1595> will. <WG1595>
For perhaps <WG5029> he was for this <WG3778> reason <WG1223> parted <WG5563> [from you] for a while, <WG5610> that you should have <WG568> him back <WG568> forever, <WG166>

no <WG3765> longer <WG3765> as a slave, <WG1401> but more <WG5228> than <WG5228> a slave, <WG1401> a beloved <WG27> brother, <WG80> especially <WG3122> to me, but how <WG4214> much <WG4214> more <WG3123> to you, both <WG2532> in the flesh <WG4561> and in the Lord. <WG2962>
If <WG1487> then <WG3767> you regard <WG2192> me a partner, <WG2844> accept <WG4355> him as [you would] me.
But if <WG1487> he has wronged <WG91> you in any <WG5100> way, <WG5100> or <WG2228> owes <WG3784> you anything, <WG5100> charge <WG1677> that to my account; <WG1677>

I, Paul, <WG3972> am writing <WG1125> this with my own <WG1699> hand, <WG5495> I will repay <WG661> it (lest <WG2443> <WG3361> I should mention <WG3004> to you that you owe <WG4359> to me even <WG2532> your own <WG4572> self <WG4572> as well <WG4359>).
Yes, <WG3483> brother, <WG80> let me benefit <WG3685> from you in the Lord; <WG2962> refresh <WG373> my heart <WG4698> in Christ. <WG5547>

Having <WG3982> confidence <WG3982> in your obedience, <WG5218> I write <WG1125> to you, since I know <WG3609> that you will do <WG4160> even <WG2532> more <WG5228> than <WG5228> what <WG3739> I say. <WG3004>
And at the same <WG260> time <WG260> also <WG2532> prepare <WG2090> me a lodging; <WG3578> for I hope <WG1679> that through <WG1223> your prayers <WG4335> I shall be given <WG5483> to you.
Epaphras, <WG1889> my fellow <WG4869> prisoner <WG4869> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> greets <WG782> you,
[as do] Mark, <WG3138> Aristarchus, <WG708> Demas, <WG1214> Luke, <WG3065> my fellow <WG4904> workers. <WG4904>
The grace <WG5485> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with your spirit. <WG4151>
